name: Ships
definition: Ships (player-controlled spacecraft for combat, industry, exploration, and trade; including defensive systems like shields, armor, and structure; module fitting for weapons and equipment; ship classes from frigates to titans; and specialized roles like electronic warfare or damage output)
description: In EVE Online, ships are vehicles used for a wide range of activities, from combat to industry, each with specific roles and abilities. Key features include three defensive systems (shields, armor, structure) and module slots for fitting weapons, support systems, and propulsion equipment. Ships range in size from small frigates to massive titans, with each class having distinct roles, and individual ships often specialize in specific areas like electronic warfare, armor or shield reinforcement, or high damage output.

name: Alliance Tournament XXI Feeders & Prizes
definition: Alliance Tournament XXI Feeders & Prizes (competitive PvP event mechanics, qualification rounds (Feeders), and unique prize ships (Skua, Anhinga) within Eve Online).
description: Discussions on the Alliance Tournament XXI Feeders and this year's prize ships.

name: History of Eve
definition: History of Eve (discussions on past events, major player-driven wars, significant in-game events, evolution of player empires and alliances, key betrayals, historical meta shifts, player-driven narratives)
description: Discussions on the history of Eve & Historic moments.

name: Legion Expansion
definition: Legion Expansion (new features, new ships, Freelance Jobs, Surgical Strike reversions, Equinox sovereignty updates, Babaroga)
description: EVE Legion is a new expansion for EVE Online releasing 27 May that includes features like the Freelance Jobs, new ships, Surgical Strike reversions, and Equinox sov updates.

name: EVE Vanguard
definition: EVE Vanguard (upcoming sci-fi sandbox FPS, separate game set in the EVE universe, pre-alpha open playtests like Operation Nemesis, crossover events with EVE Online).
description: EVE Vanguard is an upcoming a sci-fi sandbox first person shooter. The game is set in the EVE universe but is separate to EVE: Online. The game is currently in an open playtest of its pre-alpha version. The current playtest, running in September 2025 is called Operation Nemesis. There is a concurrent crossover event running in EVE: Online also called Operation Nemesis.

name: 2d Map
definition: 2D Starmap (new or updated in-game map features for navigation across Eve Online's star systems, focusing on customization and readability)
description: On September 27 we announced a playtest of a highly anticipated 2D map.

name: June 24th Update
definition: Game Update: June 24th (Quality of Life improvements, content updates for Pochven, new exploration rewards, mineral market adjustments including Pyerite, Skyhook raidability changes.)
description: On 24 June we had a quality of life update that addressed "Little Things" and some updates to Pochven. These are amongst the most popular with players. This also included updates to the mineral mark, with the easing of Pyerite bottlenecks, adding new rewards to exploration content, and increasing the raidability for Skyhooks.
